hyperparameters.short_desc: The loss function to use in the boosting process.

hyperparameters.name: learning_rate
hyperparameters.short_desc: The learning rate, also known as shrinkage.

hyperparameters.name: max_depth
hyperparameters.short_desc: The maximum depth of each tree.

hyperparameters.name: min_samples_leaf
hyperparameters.short_desc: The minimum number of samples per leaf.

hyperparameters.name: max_leaf_nodes
hyperparameters.short_desc: The maximum number of leaves for each tree.
